statements: DELETE FROM unusual_transactions WHERE account_id = 'a5d262f5-9c37-4d92-af52-d662d39d5672' AND transaction_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND user_id = 10;
DELETE FROM anomalies WHERE detected_date < '2022-01-01' AND anomaly_type = 'irregular' AND transaction_id IN (SELECT transaction_id FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 15);
DELETE FROM flagged_transactions WHERE user_id = 500 AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM unusual_transactions WHERE user_id = 100 AND amount > 500
DELETE FROM unusual_transactions WHERE flagged = true;
DELETE FROM unusual_transactions WHERE flagged = TRUE;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND user_id = 5;
